type: RCMP Indoor Ranges, Lead Removal Services
short_summary: This tender is for the cleaning, removal, disposal and/or recycling of hazardous waste material from four RCMP Indoor Firearms ranges in Alberta.
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) K Division, Real Property and Asset Management has a requirement for the cleaning, removal, disposal and/or recycling of hazardous waste material from four (4) RCMP Indoor Firearms ranges located in Edmonton, Red Deer, Edson and St. Paul, Alberta. The Request for Proposal (RFP) is distributed to the EW479-162880 Hazardous Waste Disposal Services Supply Arrangement (SA) holders that are qualified for work in the province of Alberta.
full_summary:
===================================================

**Lead Removal Services - RCMP Indoor Ranges, K Division**

*Reference Number*: PW-23-01031270
*Solicitation Number*: M5000-21-3793/A
*Tender Closing Date*: April 17th, 2023, 16:00:00

**Subject and Background**
-------------------------

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), K Division’s Real Property and Asset Management, requires services for the removal and disposal of hazardous waste material from four (4) RCMP Indoor Firearms ranges in Edmonton, Red Deer, Edson, and St. Paul, Alberta.

**Tender Announcement**
----------------------

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is distributed to certified suppliers with a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under Contract Number EW479-162880, Hazardous Waste Disposal Services, for work in the province of Alberta. Interested suppliers who do not possess a valid SA may obtain one by responding to the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) with the solicitation number EW479-162880 at <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-ncs-030-11940> Rematch the RFSA validity remains until Services Publics and Approvisionnement Canada deems it necessary.

**Procurement Details**
---------------------

* Tender Status: Expired
* GSIN: E108CA - Hazardous Chemical Waste Disposal Services
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Limited Tendering Reason: None

**Contact Information and Solicitation Documents**
----------------------------------------------

* Contact Name: Andrew Johnson
* Contact Email: andrew.johnson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: 780-670-8553
